text: hello this is chef john from food wishes

turn down medium and then start a

ization all the beef has to be crumbled
down into small bits that's what gives

once that happens we're going to add

and we're going to saute that for

basically going to deglaze any meat
juices from the bottom and believe me
there will be meat juices caramelize
